ygData.subject: Tentacle Terrors
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, you re pretty good.  Even at 23, the Terrors still give me trouble sometimes...since they usually come in pairs.  One time those suckers hit me back right
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, you're pretty good. Even at 23, the Terrors still give me trouble
sometimes...since they usually come in pairs. One time those suckers hit me
back right into the lap of a couple Ogre guards. :) Let's just say it was
not a fun experience. :) How do you handle that second Terror if you are
solo?

-- Lim'Dul


>Anyways.. I'm only 18... but I can solo the Terrors in that first >Terror
>room
>near the entrance..

I'll raise my skills up a bit before going any further than that.

Dreven -- Co-seeker of stuph =)
